description: The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a tender for the purchase of one (1) automatic titrator that can be used for measuring pH and performing rapid titration of food products.  The instrument must have a precise measurement capability and the ability to work efficiently in different conditions.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Purchase of Automatic Titrator

#### Tender Information

* **Reference**: cb-673-62374881
* **Solicitation Number**: 01B46-23-192 (Revised)
* **Publication Date**: December 5, 2023
* **Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Amendment**: 5
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Research and Development Centre (RDC) in St-Hyacinthe, Quebec, is seeking the acquisition of one (1) automatic titrator. This instrument will be used for the measurement of pH and precise titration of food products.

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Contract Address**: 2001 Robert-Bourassa Boulevard, Montreal, QC H3A 3N2, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Marie-Pier Parent, Email: [marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca](mailto:marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca), Phone: (506) 531-7263
* **Attachments**: [Notice Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26774/npp-apm-23-192.pdf)
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Country and Province Eligibility

This tender call is open to bidders across Canada, with the exception of the National Capital Region (NCR). The instrument will be used primarily in the province of Quebec.

#### Trade Agreements and Classification

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **UNSPC Code**: 41115600 - Electrochemical Measuring Instruments and Accessories

Please find additional relevant information embedded in the below document link:

[Notice Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26774/npp-apm-23-192.pdf) 
This document will be the deciding source of information in case of conflicting details between documents.
